name: The Beat is Boss
description:
THE BEAT IS BOSS

You don't have control of when you move. The beat will decide.

You can only jump or start moving when a circle on the bottom is inside of the marker. You're not in control the rest of the time. Try to get through the entire gauntlet, featuring spikes, moving platforms, lazers and more spikes. Don't forget the time limit!

Soundtrack files and controller support included.

Solo entry. All the art and the full soundtrack was made by me.

Estimated playtime: 10 minutes

Have Fun!
